message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
